attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Queen to address this issue as  soon as possible.
The government needs to be dissolved, as they are not fit for purpose, and this can be done by the Queen.
This country is on it's knee's, and something needs to be done NOW.
They do not listen to the people of this country.
So if you want your country back.
Please vote here, send a message to the government ,.that you do not want them in Power.
